properties.name: borders
properties.description:
Controls whether dividers are placed between rows and columns.

Note: This is not supported when used with `minColumnWidth`.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Adds the specified classes to the root element of the component.
properties.deprecatedTag: Custom CSS is not supported. For testing and other use cases, use [data attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/HTML/Howto/Use_data_attributes).

properties.name: columns
properties.description:
Specifies the number of columns in each grid row.
When `minColumnWidth` is not set, only up to 4 columns are supported.

properties.name: disableGutters
properties.description: Determines whether the default gutters between columns are removed.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Adds the specified ID to the root element of the component.
properties.deprecatedTag:
The usage of the `id` attribute is reserved for internal use cases. For testing and other use cases,
use [data attributes](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/HTML/Howto/Use_data_attributes). If you must
use the `id` attribute, consider setting it on a parent element instead.

properties.name: minColumnWidth
properties.description:
Use together with `columns` to specify the desired minimum width for each column in pixels.

The number of columns is determined by the value of this property, the available space,
and the maximum number of columns as defined by the `columns` property.

properties.name: variant
properties.description: Specifies the content type. This determines the spacing of the grid.
